keyword: how many calories is in a teaspoon of peanut butter
title: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a teaspoon of peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter?
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter (no added sugar or salt); ~5 g per teaspoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, ingredients (e.g., added oils/sugars), and exact measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A teaspoon of peanut butter has about 32 calories, with 1.3 g protein and 2.7 g healthy fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Chunky style (with peanut pieces) per teaspoon

faqs.q: How many calories is in a teaspoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Approximately 32 calories for natural smooth peanut butter.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.7 g fat per teaspoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.
Around 1.3 g protein per teaspoon, making it a good snack addition.

faqs.q: What about carbs in a teaspoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Low at 1 g total carbs, with 0.3 g fiber and 0.4 g sugars.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Natural brands are lower (~32 kcal); sweetened or hydrogenated ones can reach 40+ kcal per teaspoon.
